title: Deliciously moist triple lemon sponge cake
ingredients: ['170g (6 oz) self-raising flour', '170g (6 oz) caster sugar', '170g (6 oz) butter or margarine, softened', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 lemons', '2 to 3 tablespoons lemon curd', '100g (3 1/2 oz) granulated sugar', '50 to 75g (2 to 3 oz) icing sugar']
